contextId.information: Something about God's hair looked like pure wool. Possible meanings are that 1) it was very white (UDB) or 2) it was thick and curly. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_simile]])
contextId.quote: the hair of his head was like pure wool

contextId.information: His body gleamed with blue or yellow light as if it were made of topaz. AT: "his body gleamed like topaz" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_simile]])
His face shone brightly as a bolt of lightning shines. AT: "his face shone with light as bright as the flash of lightning" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_simile]])

His arms and feet were as shiny as if they were made of polished bronze. AT: "his arms and feet shone like polished bronze that reflects the light around it" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_simile]])
contextId.quote: his arms and his feet were like polished bronze

contextId.information: This refers to God's people who will share their wisdom with those around them. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_simile]])
contextId.quote: Those who are wise will shine like the brightness of the sky above
